cmapplot

Source: R/cmapplot.R
cmapplot.Rd

This package contains extra palettes, themes and geoms for ggplot2, based on Chicago Metropolitan Agency for Planning (CMAP) design guidelines.

Details

Detailed documentation can be viewed at https://cmap-repos.github.io/cmapplot.

Please report issues and suggest improvements at https://github.com/CMAP-REPOS/cmapplot/issues.

See also

Useful links:

  • https://cmap-repos.github.io/cmapplot

  • https://github.com/CMAP-REPOS/cmapplot

  • Report bugs at https://github.com/CMAP-REPOS/cmapplot/issues
